name: docking-station
description: Docking Station is a self-hosted UI for managing Docker Compose environments. It allows starting, stopping, and monitoring services in real-time, suitable for personal servers and developers.
features: Compose UI: Manage Docker Compose environments visually. Simplified operations.
Service Monitoring: Track service status in real-time. Stay informed instantly.
Quick Actions: Start, stop, and restart services easily. Efficient control.
Developer-Friendly: Perfect for personal servers and development. Built for developers.
Real-Time Updates: See changes as they happen. Live monitoring.
Self-Hosted: Run your compose manager privately. Your services, your dashboard.
